inn1.comm: short of a length outside off, Sehwag slaps it behind point for a single
A hint of away movement, Tendulkar tries to defend to the leg side, gets outside edge towards point
pitched up this time, Tendulkar drives fluently towards extra cover
right on the money again, cramps Tendulkar up, he blocks it towards the covers
maintains a tight line around off, Tendulkar pushes it off the backfoot toward point
on a length, Tendulkar reaches out to drive through cover, gets a thick outside edge down to third man to get off the mark
he starts with a no-ball, nice line and length but he's just conceded a free-hit
Massive! Tendulkar takes full toll of the free hit, a short of length, Tendulkar takes a couple of paces down the ground and slams that over long-on
short of length, tried to whip it off his pads, gets an inside edge and the ball dribbles down the pitch
nice, confident drive from Tendulkar, but the placement wasn't too good, straight towards extra cover
in the corridor outside off, on a length, Tendulkar shoulders arms to that one
slidin on to the pads, Tendulkar flicks it off his thigh pad, but Maharoof cuts that off at midwicket

Tendulkar's gone! lbw, nips in towards the batsmen, pitched up by Fernando, hits the batsman on front of leg stump, that looked to be sliding down, another not-too-great decision ends Tendulkar's innings
Sehwag swipes a length ball on middle and leg towards midwicket, no run
tries to carve that one past point, mistimes it and the ball rolls towards the fielder
overpitched on off, Gambhir walks across the stumps and flicks it towards short midwicket
tight line around off, Gambhir defends it towards point
a touch wider this time, Gambhir lets that one through to Sangakkara

dropped, similar ball to the previous one, Gambhir goes for a  booming drive edges it towards Thilina Kandamby at point, that was shoulder high, Kandamby should have caught that one, he seemed to have sighted it late
Gambhir celebrates the life with a superbly timed flick to the square leg boundary
Fernando's old no-ball problem crops up again, that pitched just outside leg and hit Gambhir on the pads
And Gambhir has capitalised on it, a full delivery, Gambhir backs away and lashes that through point
Another no-ball, and another free-hit, this was short and wide, Gambhir taps it towards backward point
short ball, cramps up Gambhir, who cut that in the air towards third man, not too much power behind that shot, it goes one bounce to the fielder at third man
good bouncer from Fernando, Sehwag wanted to sent that to the point boundary, doesn't make contact
nto as short this time, and directed at the body, Sehwag punches it through the covers

Gambhir's gone, that was lucky for Sri Lanka, Sehwag pushes the ball back towards the bowler, who does well to get a hand onto the ball, it brushes his fingers and crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end, where Gambhir is caught well out of his crease
in the channel outside off, Yuvraj shoulders arms
Wow, it's only his second ball, but no one seems to have told Yuvraj,. who caresses an overpitched ball to the point boundary
a touch wider outside off, Yuvraj is content to let that one through to the keeper
Kulasekara's on the button again, closer to the stumps this time, Yuvraj defends it back to the bowler
ooh, that dropped just just short of Jayawardene at slip, Yuvraj pushed hard at that delivery, got the outside edge but it didn't carry
Yuvraj is beaten this time as he opens the face to steer the ball to third man, nice take by Sangakkara, who is standing up to the stumps
Sehwag is beaten this time, the spilt finger slower ball, goes through to the keeper
Sehwag turns it deep square leg for a single
wonderful timing from Yuvraj, it was just a push from his, the ball races away towards the midwicket boundary, the batsmen have enough time to get three
back of a length on middle, Sehwag gets on his toes and taps it to the leg side, batsmen scurry through for a quick single
well wide of offstump, Yuvraj leaves it through to the keeper
low full toss on legstump, Yuvraj seemed to have been surprised by that initially, adjusts and flicks it square, timing is superb again, and that runs away to the boundary after evading the fielder
that kept a touch low after pitching on a length, Sehwag decided to play that off the backfoot but his attempted cut doesn't cut
runs it down very fine to third man, Ajantha Mendis runs across to try cut it off, but he manages to dive over the ball, and that's a boundary
shows the full face of the bat and defends it towards mid off
Shot! that was on offstump, Sehwag gets the timing and placemnt spot-on, not too much power in that drive but it still races away to the extra cover boundary
follows that up with an ugly swipe, mistimes towards the fielder at midwicket
Kulasekara strays on the pads, Sehwag tucks it towards deep square leg and ambles through for a single
bangs in a bouncer, Sehwag taps it towards midwicket off the backfoot
length ball on middle, Yuvraj shuffles across and whips it towards midwicket, placement is awry, straight to the fielder
good over so far from Fernando, this one is close to offstump, on a length, Yuvraj leaves that through to the keeper
Fernando grunts as he sends in a 144k delivery, Yuvraj turns it from offstump towards midwicket, straight to the fielder again
disdainfully pulled by Yuvraj, it was just a touch short, Yuvraj doesn't even bother to get on the backfoot, smashes that over midwicket for four
short ball on off, Yuvraj is squared up as he tries to defend, gets a thick outside edge towards gully
Yuvraj attempts to drive that one away from his body, gets another outside edge, this time the ball goes towards third man
Kulasekara surprises Sehwag with a bouncer, Sehwag shaped for the pull before opting out of the stroke, deemed a wide for being too high
length ball, slanting towards leg, Sehwag carts that over the infield, goes to the wide long-on boundary
this was on offstump, Sehwag was trying to crash that through midwicket, it flies straight down the ground for another boundary
another boundary, full toss on legstump, Sehwag takes a step towards the legside and dispatches that to the midwicket boundary

huge appeal for lbw, Sehwag is lucky to still be there, a slower ball from Kulasekara, hits him in front of middle, the umpire might have been thrown off as the bat hit Sehwag's pad and then the ball just after the ball hit the batsman's pad
driven to mid-off for a single
starts off with a delivery in the corridor outside off, Sehwag defends towards point
nice length from Maharoof, that was on middle stump, Sehwag still opens the face to steer the ball towards point
that nipped back after pitching just outside off, Sehwag was going for the cut though they was hardly any room for that shot, he's beaten
away from the stumps this time, Sehwag has enough space to dab that towards third man
back of a length, on the left hander's offstump, Yuvraj is content to defend it towards the bowler
slightly pitched up this time, Maharoof maintains that accurate line, Yuvraj pushes it towards cover point
defended by Sehwag towards cover
on the pads,Yuvraj turns it to square leg
pitched up by Mendis, Yuvraj takes a big stride out as launches that over mid-off, that's runs away for a boundary
works it towards midwicket
a bit of width for Yuvraj, he rocks back and cracks that one behind point where Kapugedera makes a good diving stop
swept off his pads towards fine leg
overpitched on offstump, Yuvraj launches that down the ground, past mid-on for a boundary
bit short of length, going down leg, hits Yuvraj on his thigh pad
keeps pegging away at a good length, this one is on middle, Yuvraj defends it back to the bowler
lovely shot from Yuvraj, short ball and a little bit of width, Yuvraj cuts that off the front foot, placement was perfect, wide of the third man fielder, and that's another boundary
some space for Yuvraj to work with again, but this one is much fuller, and Yuvraj can only push it towards cover
shortish ball on middle, Yuvraj goes for a n extravagant pull, gets a bottom edge and the ball trickles towards short fine leg
Fernando bowls it wide to Sehwag, usually a bad idea, Sehwag tries to crack that past point but he mistimes it to the fielder
much better delivery, closer to the stump, Sehwag gets on his toes and flicks it towards midwicket
a slower ball gone wrong, turns out in a high full toss, not high enough to be a no ball, Yuvraj is surprised by the delivery and just about manages to defend it
low full toss this time, Yuvraj crunches it towards mid-off, Jayasuriya throws himself to his right to cut it off
fantastic placement from Yuvraj, overpitched by Fernando, Yuvraj leans into the offdrive, no power behind that shot but it bisects mid-off and extra cover and races to the boundary
directed towards Yuvraj's rib cage, he turns it to short fine leg for a single to retain strike
wide outside off, Yuvraj steers that to point, doesn't worry about footwork while playing that shot
Maharoof keeps him quiet, good old line and length bowling from him which seems to have become unfashionable these days

and just after I type that, he sends one down the legside, the batsmen decided to go for a single after Sangakkara fumbled it, Mendis charges in from short fine leg, a direct hit a the non-striker's end would have caught Yuvraj short
digs it in short, Sehwag is cramped for room, defends it off the backfoot
slower ball, 109k, a bit of width for Sehwag, who slashes that down to third man
oh poor bowling that, fine leg is in the circle, Maharoof slides it on the legstump, Yuvraj picks up an easy boundary by tucking that wide of the fielder
much better from Maharoof, just outside off, Yuvraj tips it at his feet and the batsmen scurry through for a single
overpitched by Fernando, Yuvraj drives him to deep point and ambles through for a single
that jagged back after pitching on off, Sehwag played that off middle stump, opening the face to steer it to backward point
back of a length on off, Sehwag punches it towards cover for a single
the most unconvincing of Yuvraj's boundaries so far, he was looking to play that very fine down the leg side, gets an edge and flies towards deep backward square leg
another boundaries for Yuvraj, Fernando slips it on to the batsman's pads, Yuvraj helps himself to four runs by tickling it very fine down the legside
Yuvraj gets to his half-century by gliding the last ball of the over to third man for a single
celebrates reaching the milestone by lifting Maharoof's first ball over mid-off, a couple of bounces before it reaches the boundary, that's his 11th boundary
shortish ball on offstump, Yuvraj punches it back to the bowler
slower ball on legstump, Yuvraj goes for the pull, but doesn't quite get hold of it, placement isn't great either, finding the man at short fine leg
whistles down the legside again, not very clever bowling by Maharoof as the fine leg is up in the circle
again he bowls it on legstump, pays the penalty this time, Yuvraj glances it off his pads, very fine for a boundary
yet again on legstump, Maharoof isn't learning, is he? this time Yuvraj plays it off his hips to the right of the short fine leg fielder for another four
disastrous over from Maharoof, once more on the pads, Yuvraj says "Thank you very much" and turns it to the fine leg boundary, he's rocketed along to 66 off 46
starts off with a short ball, Sehwag gets on the backfoot and crunches that through the covers
defended back to the bowler
looking to smash that over mid-on, gets a thick bottom edge and the ball bounces back to the bowler
very short from Mendis, Sehwag waits for it, opens the face to get his placement right, wide of the fielder at point, and the boundaries continue to flow for India
much better length from Mendis, gets Sehwag onto the front foot, he drives it to long-on, saunters through for a single
on the pads, Yuvraj helps it on it's way to short fine leg
down the leg side, Sehwag turns it to short fine leg
pushed to midwicket  by Yuvraj, he goes for a dangerous second run, he's nearly run out as he completes the second, the throw was pretty weak though
down the leg side by Murali
defended towards midwicket, batsmen scurry through for a single
misses a flick off his pads
turned to short fine leg
cracks it against the spin to backward point, straight to the fielder
whoah, that was big turn for Mendis, Yuvraj is beaten outside the offstump
Yuvraj swipes that through midwicket, doesn't quite get hold of it, it drops short of the fielder
a repeat of the previous shot, the ball flies closer to Maharoof at midwicket this time, he couldn't make enough ground to reach the ball, he seemed to react late
drives it to long on off the backfoot
slogged by Sehwag to the midwicket region, Fernando was the fielder, he gets one hand to it after running towards the boundary, but he can't hang on to it and it trickles over the boundary for four
wide outside off, Yuvraj cuts towards cover
tipped towards backward point, quick single results
outside the leg stump, Sehwag gets to his half-century by just helping that very fine down the leg side
swept off the pads for a single to midwicket
sensational, that was angling down leg, Sehwag back away and plays an inside out drive for four, timing and placement were fantastic on that shot, bisects mid-off and extra cover
dabbed towards cover for an easy single
massive appeal for lbw, carrom ball from Mendis, Sehwag gets an inside edge on to his pads as he sweeps
driven firmly to the covers off the backfoot
steered towards point with soft hands by Yuvraj, another easy single
Bang! that was on offstump, Sehwag walks a little towards leg and clobbers that flat between the bowler and mid-off
wide down the leg side
crunched to long-off for a single
Sehwag's going bersek here, that was tossed up on legstump, a doosra, Sehwag gets his front foot out of the way and slams him inside out to the extra cover boundary
tapped towards point for a single
Yuvraj tries a cute dab to third man, beaten by the turn
driven firmly towards cover for a single by Yuvraj
flicked from middle and leg, batsman think of a second, but decide against it
nicely flighted by Murali, Yuvraj steps out and punches it back to the bowler
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
worked away easily wide of square leg for another single
much slower through the air, lands full outside off, pushed wide of the bowler for a single towards long-off
flatter, and much quicker this time, Yuvraj tries to work that away towards midwicket, gets a leading edge that lands well short of short cover
flighted on middle and off, pushed wide of midwicket

dropped a sitter!! That was short on the off stump, Sehwag could have hit that anywhere but slapped it straight back to the bowler, Jayasuriya was late to react, he fails to cup a dolly and buries his face in his hands after realising the enormity of his mistake
turned to short fine leg by Sehwag
watchfully defended back to the bowler, not much of that in this innings so far
tapped towards  short midwicket, three dot balls so far
dabs it towards point, Sehwag and Yuvraj scamper through a quick single
Murali gives the ball some air, Yuvraj gets in the front foot and defends
overpitched outside off by Murali, Yuvraj drives it powerfully to long-off
uses his feet, and sweeps it towards deep square leg
just outside off, Sehwag backs away to make more space, lashes it towards the sweeper at boundary
low full toss on the legstump, Yuvraj taps it towards short midwicket
Shot! that ends a short quiet spell for India, massive hit by Yuvraj clears the long-on by a distance, there was  fielder in the deep but that didn't stop Yuvraj from going for the shot
pulled off the backfoot for a single
driven to long-on for an easy single
played towards deep midwicket for a single
defended towards extra cover by Yuvraj
a touch short, a doosra from Murali, Yuvraj shuffles across his stumps and helps it towards backward square leg
flicked towards short fine leg
overpitched outside off, Yuvraj punches it to long-off
on middle and leg, another easy single to complete the over, this time to square leg
they continue to milk the bowling, Sehwag pushes it towards long-on
overpitched on the pads, Yuvraj drives to extra cover
similar ball, Yuvraj places the ball better this time, get another single
overpitched on legstump, Sehwag punches it to long-on
Yuvraj steers it towards short fine leg
arm ball, short ball, Sehwag rocks back and pulls it away high over midwicket, the fielder in the deep had no chance of cutting it off, two bounces before rolling over the boundary
flighted delivery outside off, Yuvraj sweeps, gets a bit of a top edge, ball lands safely near square leg though
full on the pads, worked towards midwicket for a single
tossed up by Murali, pitched outside off and turned further awy, Yuvraj waited on the backfoot, stabs it towards third man, got his placement perfect and that takes him to 98
fired on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
straighter ball on middle, Yuvraj turns it to fine leg
just outside off, Sehwag tries to open the face of the bat, gets a thick outside edge, and that runs away for very fine towards the third man boundary, Sehwag moves into the 90s now
length ball on middle, Yuvraj nudges that behind square on the legside, and gets to his hundred
a bit of width for Sehwag, he jabs it towards third man for a single
back of a length, a bit of width, Yuvraj stands tall and tries to crack that through the offside, thick bottom edge and it trickles towards cover
Maharoof is still afflicted with his old problem, bowling down  the leg isde, Yuvraj tickles it down the leg side for yet another boundary
this time he keeps it on middle, Yuvraj backs away and clatters that through the covers
slightly overpitched by Maharoof, Yuvraj crunches that towards Ajantha Mendis at deep cover
very wide outside the offstump
tipped towards point, batsmen hare through for a quick single
overpitched on middle and leg, Sehwag helps himself to a single to long-on
holds the length back a touch, gets big turn,and Yuvraj is beaten outside off
played off the backfoot towards the cover fielder

lofts it back past the bowler, Murali just about gets his hand on it, but that was travelling very fast, it goes down towards long-off, Sehwag had set off for the first one very quickly, that gives his time to come back for the second
a bit of room outside off, Yuvraj rocks back onto the backfoot and stabs it through the covers
played off the backfoot for a single towards midwicket
overpitched on offstump, Sehwag manages to squeeze that towards the boundary behind point
plays it back to the bowler
slightly short, Sehwag waits for it and dismisses that past wide long-on for a boundary, he moves on to 98
a bit of width, Sehwag opens the face and steers it towards third man for two, that takes him to his century, a jump midway through his first run shows his delight
defended back to the bowler
Murali gives it some air, Yuvraj gets forward and turns it to square leg for a single
played to square leg, took off for a run, decides to come back after Dilshan moves in quickly to collect the ball
Sehwag mishits it towards long-on, lands safely though, everything going India's way
and Sri Lanka are falling apart here, Yuvraj cuts it towards the boundary, Mendis could have stopped that easily, he comically lets the ball go through his legs for a four

the partnership finally ends, Yuvraj rocks back to cut an outside off delivery from Murali, not much power on that shot, it goes straight to Jayawardene at cover point, much-needed wicket for Sri Lanka
overpitched outside off, Dhoni gets that away behind point for a single
starts off with a full toss on legstump, Dhoni flicks it towards midwicket for a single
another full toss, this time on offstump, pretty high as well, just below waist high, Sehwag opens the face and guides it behind point, placement isn't right, can't beat the man in the circle
tucked off his thigh pads for a single, the batsmen were thinking of a second, but Murali was quickly onto the ball, and they were kept down to a single, Sri Lanka need more fielding like that
shortish ball on offstump, Dhoni gets behind the line of the ball and works it to the leg side
full toss on middle and leg, whipped away towards the boundary, that'll get the batsmen two, and bring up India's 250
short ball directed at teh body, Sehwag gets on the backfoot to pull, gets a bottom edge and the ball dribbles back on the pitch
firmly driven towards cover for a single
shortish outside off, punched off the backfoot to deep cover
right in the blockhole, Sehwag wanted to dispatch that over long-on, gets a thick inside edge on to his boots
another yorker from Kulasekara, Sehwag squeezes it towards square leg, good running from the batsman fetches them two
Shot! short ball from Kulasekara after he saw Sehwag coming down the track, Sehwag adjust his shot, plays a deft upper cut which runs away fine to the third man boundary
another yorker to end the over, Sehwag digs it out towards extra cover, picks up an easy single
length ball on off, driven uppishly by Sehwag wide of the bowler, Jayasuriya does the fielding in the deep
back of a length delivery on the legstump, that stayed a touch low, Dhoni adjusts his stroke at the last moment, manages to get it away towards square leg
superb yorker on legstump by Fernando, 135 kmph, Sehwag just about manages to keep that out
follows that up with a poor delivery, length ball on legstump, Sehwag carts that over the infield to the midwicket boundary

Sehwag's gone! run-out by a direct hit from Jayasuriya, Sehwag punches the ball towards mid-off, and sets off for a tight single, but is caught about a couple of feet short of his crease, he didn't bother waiting for the third umpire's decision
slower bpouncer to end the over from Fernando, 104 kmph, Dhoni was startled by that one, belatedly attempts a pull but is beaten
length ball on off stump, Raina pushes it back to the bowler
Raina punches an overpitched ball to mid-on, Sehwag's dismissal should slow the run-rate
Raina's shows he's not going to hang around, launching a length ball from Kulasekara over mid-on, timing wasn't great, batsmen have time to get three though
drives it through the covers for a single
back of a length ball, on offstump, Raina forces it towards mid-off and screams "no no no no no" to Dhoni who wanted the single
full ball on legstump, Raina works it away towards midwicket for a single which helps him retain the strike
starts with an offbreak that beats Raina, Sangakkara whips off the bails and belts out an appeal for lbw, Raina's foot was grounded though
very short, Raina rocks back and cuts it, runs away to long-off
Dhoni rocks back to make space to swing the bat, and gets it through the offside for a single
defended back to the bowler
on the legstump, Raina gets a big stride in but he can only block the ball back to the bowler
three dot ball in a row to end the over, Raina can't get a legstump ball away
a length ball on legstump, Dhoni whips it to short midwicket
surprises Dhoni with the slower delivery, overpitched and Dhoni can only slam it back to the bowler
yet another dot ball, a full toss but Dhoni can't beat the man at midwicket again
another low full toss, this time Dhoni punches it to long-on and ambles through for a single
Raina pushes the ball to the bowler's left, Kulasekara moves quickly across to cut that off
boundary after what seems a long time for India, a full ball outside off, Raina squeezes it very fine to the third man boundary
carrom ball from Mendis, Dhoni opens the face and stabs it towards point for a single
kept a bit low after pitching on a length, Raina was on the backfoot, just about managed to get some bat on it, would have been bowled otherwise

Raina's gone! good fightback by Sri Lanka, Mendis held the length back a bit sensing Raina may come down the track, the spin takes the ball away from Raina, he's stranded miles out of his crease and Sangakkara makes an easy stumping
very short from Mendis, Yusuf pulls, mistimes it towards square leg
lashed towards long-off by Dhoni for a single
short of length ball on middle and off, Yusuf cautiously defends it back to the bowler
Dhoni tips it towards point, sets off for a single and then sends Yusuf back
defended to extra cover
short ball on legstump, Dhoni moves across abd plays it to short fine leg, no run again, three dot balls so far
overpitched on legstump, Dhoni defends back to the bowler
outside the legstump, Dhoni whips it to short fine leg, can Jayasuriya complete a maiden?
Jayasuriya completes a priceless over, Dhoni can only push the last ball to mid-on, that's a maiden
overpitched on middle and off, Yusuf sweeps it to fine leg
whipped to long-on by Dhoni, the batsman wlak across for a single
width provided, Yusuf chops it hard but straight to Jayawardene at point
Yusuf's sweep gets a bottom edge and the ball runs away under the keeper, Kulasekara makes good ground at the boundary to save a run for his side
short and a touch wide, Dhoni hammers it towards long-off for a single
overpitched on offstump, Yusuf gets forward and pokes it toward cover, straight to the fielder, no run
Dhoni turns the first ball towards backward square leg, he seems in no hurry here
Shot! tossed up by Jayasuriya, Yusuf takes a couple of paces down the tarck and clobbers it over long-on for a six
carefully defended back down the pitch by Yusuf
low full toss outside off, Yusuf punches it towards long-off
Dhoni tries to force it down the ground, but Jayasuriya gets across to cut off the drive
defended back to the bowler by Dhoni
flighted delivery on legstump, Yusuf prods it towards square leg
overpitched outside off, Dhoni drives to extra cover
full ball outside off, Dhoni moves across and whips it towards midwicket
length ball on off, Dhoni pushes it towards cover for a single
overpitched on middle, Yusuf tries to lash it down the ground, Murali gets across and cuts off the powerful drive
attempts a cheeky dab to third man, the ball bounces more than he expected and goes through to the keeper
Dhoni backs away and drives it down to long-off for an easy single
fired into middle stump, Yusuf digs it out towards long-on
another single for Dhoni, this time to long-on
Yusuf punches it through the covers to gets himself a couple
tries to power it down the ground, can't beat the man at mid-off
overpitched just outside off, Yusuf backs away to make space and then cuts the ball powerfully to the point boundary
very wide outside off, Dhoni's cut gets a bottom edge and goes back towards the bowler
doosra from Murali, big turn for him, Yusuf was looking to play that to leg, then opts out of the stroke
regulation offspinner this time, Yusuf gets a big stride in and defends
doosra again, Yusuf gets to the pitch of the ball and works him towards point for a single
ooh, pitching on off and turning sharply into Dhoni, who was trying to whip it to midwicket, but misses the ball, it hit him on his pads but that was going well down the leg side
Massive six! Mendis spears it into the pads, Yusuf Pathan gets his front foot out of the way and hoicks that over midwicket for a giant six
pushed toward long-off for a single this time
down the leg side again, Dhoni pushes it to long-on for a single
tapped to cover for yet another single
Dhoni waits on the backfoot and cuts it powerfully to deep point
opens the face to play the ball square on the off side, batsmen hurry through for a quick single
Yusuf flays the first one towards long-on, Dhoni sets off quickly for the first and pushes Yusuf into coming back for the second
fired into the pads, Yusuf flicks it towards midwicket for a single
back of a length on legstump, Dhoni turns it to short fine leg off the backfoot
Yusuf goes for a big swipe over midwicket, that was a slower ball, 101 kmph, Yusuf misses it completely
yorker on offstump, thick inside edge and the ball races away very fine past the keeper for four
whipped towards midwicket, the batsmen scamper through for a couple
Bang! Kulasekara gets a warm welcome, Dhoni gets his front foot out of the way and slams the ball straight down the ground towards the sightscreen
pushed towards long-on for a single this time
patted back to the bowler by Yusuf
short slower ball on offstump, Yusuf tries to pull that powerfully through midwicket, mistimes it and the batsmen only get a single to midwicket
Dhoni powers a full ball on legstump towards long-on, the fielder had to cover some ground to get to that so the batsmen had time to take two
jabbed in the direction of cover, the bowler races across to field, Dhoni had sett off for the single Yusuf sends him back, could have been trouble if there was a direct hit
angling into the pads, Yusuf powers the ball to midwicket for a single
slower ball, 106kmph, short and on offstump, Dhoni swivels as he pulls to midwicket, Yusuf pushes Dhoni into coming back for the second
this time it goes straight to the midwicket fielder, no time to take two, the batsmen settle for a single
half-volley, Yusuf accepts the gift, clears his front foot and creams it straight down the ground, bisects the long-on and long-off fielders
Six this time! a front-foot pull to a short ball, and not too well timed either, that was all power that took it over the long-on boundary
steps down the track to meet the ball on the full and scythes that through the covers, can't beat the man in the deep, gets only a single
length ball, Yusuf tries to smash it over midwicket, gets a bottom edge towards mid-on
Dhoni drives along the ground to long-off, Yusuf is quick in getting back for the second
a slower bouncer, the pull isn't timed well, the ball trickles towards bckward square leg
great delivery from Kulasekara, yorker on offstump, Yusuf can't get underneath that one
another yorker, this time Yusuf backs away and slams it inside out over the infield, the fielder at long-off had no chance of cutting it off
carves the final ball of the innings to long-off, Dhoni is very fast between the wickets, he comes back for the second, so India finish on 363

inn2.comm: starts off with a wayward ball down the leg side, given a wide
full outside off, driven uppishly wide of mid-off where Gautam Gambhir fumbles to allow the batsmen to get back for the second
good length on middle and of, pushed firmly to mid-off on the front foot
bang on target, good length on middle, defends with a full face back to the bowler
Dilshan is away, just slightly short of a length marginally outside off stump, he rocks on the back foot and smashes it wide of cover for a boundary
full outside off but he fails to cash in this time, drives it firmly but straight to Gambhir at mid-off
held it back a touch, lands short of a good length outside off and going away with the angle, left alone to the keeper

bowled'im!!! What a start! Short of a length outside off stump, not much room there for Jayasuriya who tries to cut that off the back foot, gets an inside edge and the ball crashes into the off stump. Big blow and the crowd has gone silent.
full on middle and off, defended to the bowler off the front foot
beaten! Lands on a good length on the off stump and swings away just a touch as Sangakkara leans forward to defend
short and wide and moving away further, Sangakkara attempts a cut but it's too wide
decent away movement for Praveen, good length on the off stump, Sangakkara drops it on the off side short of cover and steals a single
beaten by the movement there, on a good length outside off, Dilshan prods at it off the front foot but the ball moves away sharply after pitching
the inswinger this time, bowled form a touch wide of the crease, angling into the batsman, the ball pitches full on middle and off, Dilshan defends it watchfuly off the front foot on the off side
excellent seam bowling, a teasing line outside off, bowled a touch full, Sangakkara is caught walking forward as the ball swings away at the last moment to evade the outside edge
full on the off stump, held its line this time, driven off the front foot to mid-off
watchfully played, good length on the off stump, defended on the off side
much fuller, just a firm push off the front foot and the ball speeds away past a diving mid-off, the batsmen sneak a couple
jagged back in, landed on a good length outside off and moved in sharply Sangakkara withdrew his bat at the right moment
almost dragged it on, it's the inswinger again, good length outside off, he tries to run that down to third man, gets a thick inside edge wide of square leg for a single
on the money again, moving a touch away from Sangakkara who guides it to backward point
tests Dilshan with the bouncer, Dilshan went for the pull, gets a top edge which flies over the keeper's head for a boundary
tapped into the covers for a single
Praveen's getting some exaggerated movement away from the left-hand batsman, this was too wide to worry Sangakkara
closer to the stumps, on a length, Sangakkara gets on the front foot and defends it  towards extra cover
on middle and off, Sangakkara shuffles across the stumps to tuck it to square leg for a couple
pitched on a length, on the offstump, Dilshan defends it towards the covers
full on the pads, Dilshan gets an inside edge on to his pads, the ball trickles away towards square leg
overpitched on offstump, punched back to the bowler, who manages to get a hand on it, the ball dribbles away towards mid-off, and the batsmen have time to take a quick single

bangs in the bouncer, Dilshan isn't going to shy away from using the pull, though he was out playing that shot in the last match, this time it bounces a couple of times before reaching Ishant at fine leg
that pitched on leg and swung further down, umpire has no hesitation in calling them a wide
lovely shot, an overpitched wide ball from Zaheer, an elegant drive from Sangakkara, all timing there, bisects extra cover and mid-off
cramps Sangakkara for room this time, he pushes it back to the bowler, who gets the ball and mimes throwing it at the stumps

Praveen has been bowling around the 125kmph mark, Dilshan walks out to this delivery, it's short but Dilshan goes for the pull, he mistimes it but it trickles over the midwicket boundary after a couple of bounces
better this time, for six, again Praveen sends down a bouncer, doesn't get up too high, Dilshan pulls and the ball sails over the boundary this time
wide outside off this time, Dilshan carves it towards third man to get himself a couple of runs
gets a thick outside edge this time and it runs away towards third man for a single
some width provided for Sangakkara, slapped fiercely by the batsman, but doesn't beat the fielder at backward point
short of a length ball angling away from Sangakkara, who watches that one through to the keeper
Dilshan creams a wide delivery towards cover point, no run for a pretty good shot
on middle and leg this time, Dilshan works it away to midwicket
Zaheer's on target here, superb line, in the channel outside off, Dilshan pats it back to the bowler
overpitched outside off, Dilshan threw everything at that, doesn't get the ball past the fielder at short cover though, that's four dot balls in this over
back of a length, on  middle and leg, Dilshan drops it to the legside, thinks of a single but the batsmen decide against it
and that's a maiden from Zaheer, this was again on the offstump, Dilshan punches it towards cover
flicked off his pads to fine leg, Pragyan Ojha had to cover some ground to get to that ball, so the batsmen have time to take two
on a length, on offstump, Sangakkara defends it towards the offside
on middle stump, Sangakkara gets a thick outside edge that races away to third man, that wasn't where he was looking to play that
slower ball, back of the hand, a bit of width for Dilshan, and he cracks that to the cover boundary
back of a length delivery, Dilshan walks down the track like Matthew Hayden and crunches that to cover, doesn't beat the infield though
tucked off his thigh pad for a single towards short fine leg
in the corridor just outside off, Sangakkara shoulders arms to that one
similar ball, Sangakkara gets onto the front foot to work it to mid-on, no run though
crisply driven by Sangakkara to the right of mid-off, he gets a single this time
Dilshan's gone! bowled by Zaheer, an offcutter from Zaheer, Dilshan goes for a huge swipe to midwicket, gets an inside edge and his stumps are shattered, that's not a replay he'd like to see
overpitched on middle, turned to square leg for a single by Jayawardene
Zaheer's on the money again, draws Sangakkara onto the front foot, the batsman can only defend that offstump delivery
back of a length ball outside off, Jayawardene flirts with that one, manages to avoid nicking it though
that one nips back into Jayawardene, who defends it off the back foot
Ishant maintains the same length, Jayawardene steers it backward point, straight to the fielder
virtually a replay of the previous ball, Jayawardene blocks it back to the bowler
and again, this is good stuff from Ishant, no runs scored off this over yet
slightly outside off, Jayawardene goes for the cut, a thick upper edge has the ball flying over slip for a boundary
lovely straight drive from Sangakkara for four, that was overpitched on middle and leg, Sangakkara's shows how good a timer of the ball he is again
wide outside off, Sangakkara reaches across for the drive, can't find the gap through the infield though
gets on the front foot and jabs it wide of mid-on to pick up a single
on a length, spearing into offstump, Jayawardene gets across his stumps and pushes it to mid-on, where Pragyan Ojha misfields to give away a single, Zaheer isn't amused by that
guided to backward point by Sangakkara, no run this time
shot! Sangakkara charges down the track and hammers it straight down the ground to fetch himself another boundary
brilliant shot from Jayawardene, flicked from outside the off stump, timing and placement were spot-on and that's another boundary for Sri Lanka
back of a length, marginally outside off, poked by Jayawardene towards cover point
another fantastic flick by Jayawardene, timing was superb as he plays it uppishly over midwicket, he looks to have regained his touch
again Ishant reverts to a short of a length, Jayawardene fends it towards backward point
angling into offstump this time, Jayawardene defends cautiously back down the pitch
another beauty from Jayawardene, the ball was on middle and leg, Jayawardene backs away, giving himself room, and scoops it inside-out to the extra cover boundary
Sangakkara gives him the charge, Praveen directed the ball at the batsman's body, no room for Sangakkara to free his arms, he chops it to short fine leg
well outside off, glided towards third man by Jayawardene
slower ball from Praveen, 109kmph, full on middle and off, Sangakkara turns it towards fine leg, Yusuf misfields to give away a second run
pitched up on offstump, Sangakkara defends back towards the bowler, the ball beats Praveen and mid-off has to do the fielding
blocked off the backfoot by Jayawardene to the bowler
a bit of width for Jayawardene to free his arms, goes for the cut which is well stopped by Yuvraj at backward point
back of a length, on offstump, tapped back to the bowler
similar ball, driven to the bowler's right, Yusuf Pathan makes a diving stop at mid-off
shuffles across the stump and helps a legstump ball to the fine leg boundary
much better line this time, just outside off, Sangakkara punches that towards the sweeper on the offside boundary
opens the face to steer a wide delivery down to third man and pick up a single
slower delivery, 103 kmph, down the leg side, Sangakkara doesn't time his leg glance, the ball rolls over to Yusuf Pathan at short fine leg
good slower delivery to start, full and just outside off, Sangakkara is beaten after he comes down the track
another slower ball, this time a short of a length, Sangakkara tips it to the offside and the batsmen immediately set off for a single
on offstump again, Jayawardene swivels as he pulls it to midwicket for a single
punched to Yusuf at mid-off, that was struck too firmly for the batsmen to have time to take a single
a yorked speared in towards offstump, Sangakkara squeezes it to the offside andthe batsmen pinch a single
shortish ball on off, swings away a touch from Jayawardene, gets a faint outside edge but it bounces once before going through to the keeper
poor delivery to start, fine leg was up in the circle,  Zaheer fires it into legstump, easily dispatched down the legside by Sangakkara
Sangakkara charges down the track and attempts a swipe to midwicket, gets a bottom edge which rolls away to the keeper's right, taht brings up Sri Lanka's 100
another lovely flick from Jayawardene, India have a fielder at deep midwicket though, this one nearly carries to him but lands safely, Praveen runs across and cuts it off
pulls a short ball down to fine leg, who is on the boundary for the right-hand batsman
full on offstump, punched to covers by Jayawardene
slower delivery, Jayawardene taps it wide of the cover fielder and the batsmen steal a quick single
driven firmly to cover, no run as it went straight to the fielder
slower ball, slightly outside off, Jayawardene stabs it towards deep point for a single
slower ball from Praveen, overpitched by Praveen, Sangakkara drives a bit uppishly towards mid-off
yet another slower ball, wasn't too well controlled, becomes a low full toss, Jayawardene thrashes it to mid-on and is disappointed he didn't put that one away
dabbed down to third man for a single, only three runs in the over so far
tries the bouncer, that slipped from his hand and pitched very very short, that sails high over the batsman's head and that's a wide
wide. low full toss, Sangakkara reaches across and dispatches that past cover point, that's the boundary Sri Lanka needed in that over
slower ball from Zaheer, 109kmph, Jayawardene pulled away and tried to dab it through slip, gets a bottom edge which goes one bounce to the keeper
back of a length delivery in the channel outside off, Jayawardene charges down the track and swings at it, he's beaten
cracked to the cover fielder, only one run for a fine shot
low and full on Sangakkara's legstump, he punches it towards mid-on to get the single which takes him to his half-century
another low full toss on the legstump, Jayawardene whips it away to deep square leg
another slow full toss, this time on middle, Sangakkara pushes it to mid-on and picks up a single
Sangakkara picks up a quick single by tapping the ball to mid-off

Jayawardene's gone, length ball from Praveen, Jayawardene comes down the track and looks to play it inside out, doesn't quite get hold of it, it swirls towards Sehwag at mid-off who completes the catch
Sangakkara continues to pick up the singles by driving down the ground
steps across and drives his first ball crisply to extra cover
bowled from wide of the crease, angling into the bastman, who stays on the backfoot and pokes it towards cover point
Praveen ends a successful over with a back of a length ball on offstump, Kandamby defends it back to the bowler
Ishant starts off with a yorker on offstump, Sangakkara pushes it back to the bowler
slips one down the leg side, Sangakkara helps it along to fine leg for a single
a low full toss outside off, Kandamby flicks it Tendulkar at short midwicket
again Kandamby can't get it past Tendulkar, only one run in the over so far
and he finds Tendulkar for the third time in a row, superb over from Ishant so far
angling across the batsman, who glides it down to third man to pick up a single
Kandamby using his feet, comes down the track and then pushes it down to long-on
nicely tossed up by Ojha, a bit wide outside off, Sangakkara slaps it toward the sweeper
Kandamby gets his first boundary,gets a big stride in and picks it up from well outside off to deposit it to the midwicket boundary
and another boundary fro Kandamby, he waltzes down the pitch and slams him straight down the ground
tries a cheeky dab to third man, bottom edges it and it bounces through to the keeper
came down the pitch and blocked back to the bowler
tossed up, pitching on middle and turning away from Sangakkara, who rocks back and pushes him through cover
Kandamby falls, Sehwag strikes with his second ball, Kandamby tries to play a reverse-sweep, edges it to Yuvraj at short third man
tossed up by Sehwag, he's getting some turn here, Kapugedera going for the sweep is hit on the pads but he was struck outside the line
gets off the mark by nudging it to square leg
driven to mid-off, straight to the fielder, no chance of a run
pitching on middle, Kapugedera pushes it towards cover
and again, this time the placement is good, the mid-off has to run to his left to cut that off
half volley wide outside off, Sangakkara isn't going to miss out on those, he crunches that through the covers for a boundary
Sangakkara charges down the pitch and swings it towards midwicket
Kapugedera is cleaned up, lovely delivery from Ojha, pitched on leg, the batsman was looking to turn it to midwicket, it turns past the outside edge of the bat and knocks back middle stump
length delivery, pitching on off, Maharoof gets on the front foot and punches it to long-on
blocked back to the bowler
turned towards square leg for a single
swept fine by Sangakkara, Sehwag just strayed onto legstump and the batsman capitalised
again on the pads, Sangakkara can't quite get hold of that on, runs away fine but not for a boundary this time
full and on middle and off, Maharoof defends it back to the bowler
turned from offstump towards square leg for a single
gets it to drifts towards legstump, Maharoof  gets a leading edge almost back to the bowler
pushed to cover, the run-rate continues to climb
defended to short midwicket
Maharoof gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
big appeal for lbw,  that was very close, pitched in line and looked to be going on to hit, height may have saved the batsman
swept behind square for a single
glanced to backward square leg, no run
played towards short midwicket
wide down the leg side
Maharoof defends it towards short midwicket
chipped towards the covers, batsmen take a single
blocked back to the bowler by Maharoof
punched down to long-on for a single
Sangakkara shuffles across the stumps and works the ball towards midwicket for a single
Maharoof shows the full face of the bat as he pushes it down to long-on for a single
that was well outside off, Sangakkara came down the pitch and tried to whip it to midwicket, doesn't get hold of it, inside edge on to the pads
Maharoof continues to pick the singles down to long-on
It's Sangakkara's turn to get the single to long-on this time, he drove that in the air but it was safe
Maharoof stick to his push it to long-on formula
flighted delivery, Sangakkara goes for the sweep, is beaten by the bounce
that is a short delivery, Sangakkara rocks back and pulls it towards the boundary, Ishant gets across and cuts it off
Maharoof retains strike by chipping the ball down the ground
patted back to the bowler
tries to drive inside out, only manages to find extra cover
cautiously defended by Maharoof
flicked to midwicket, that's four dot balls in a row
Maharoof's patience finally wears off, he goes for the slog sweep, that hangs in the air for a long time but doesn't go all the way for a boundary
swept behind square for a single
sweeps it behind square again, but can't beat Zaheer at fine leg
flighted delivery by Sehwag, Sangakkara taps it towards mid-off
swept uppishly by Sangakkara, one-bounce down to fine leg
Maharoof just out of reach of the bowler, to long-on for a single
this time Sehwag gets across quickly to his right to field the ball
drops it short this time, Sangakkara rocks back and flatbats that to long-off
Sangakkara shuffles across and nudges the ball to the leg side
fired into legstump, Maharoof drives it inside out to long-off
leading edge off Sangakkara, lands safely near square leg though
pushed towards long-off for a single
Sangakkara charges down the pitch, and hits Ojha with the spin over midwicket, placement is perfect
tries to glide that down to third man, bottom edge and it goes through to the keeper after one bounce
swept to fine leg for a single
Sangakkara sweeps, a top edge but it lands safely again, goes down to fine leg
trickles away to square leg after hitting his pad
Sangakkara sweeps to deep square leg
waltzes down the pitch and looks to drive, but he inside edges on to his pads
steps down the pitch and drives it to long-on yet again for a single
pushed to short cover, no run
comes down the pitch, gets an outside edge which doesn't carry to Gambhir at first slip
sweeps to the left of Ishant at fine leg, gives batsmen time to take a couple
beaten as he tries to drive inside out
short of a length ball, pitching on middle,  Maharoof defends off the backfoot to the bowler

this time the outside edge carries to slip, Ojha has been getting the ball to turn sharply, Maharoof was looking to defend off the front foot, a healthy edge results and Gautam Gambhir takes a low catch at first slip
Sangakkara rocks back and punches that towards mid-off
Kulasekara gets off the mark by tucking Sehwag towards backward square leg
Sangakkara steps out and tries to loft over long-off, hit the bottom of the bat, and doesn't carry to the fielder
Kulasekara looks to whip it away to midwicket, inside edges it onto the pads
flicked off the backfoot to midwicket
same shot, but the placement is better, Gambhir at midwicket had to run across to his right to stop that one, and the batsmen scurry a single
Kulasekara looks to defend, gets a thick edge towards backward point
gets behind the line and defends it back down the pitch
wide outside off and Kulasekara lets that one go
sweeps to deep backward square leg from outside off
Sangakkara falls, and that's Ojha's third wicket, looking to pull it to square leg, gets a top edge which balloons towards Yuvraj at short fine leg
golden duck for Murali, Ojha's dream spell continues, huge turn for Ojha after it pitched outside off, Murali tries to cut it, but gets a bottom edge through to Dhoni, that's two in two for Ojha
Yuvraj flights one wide outside off, driven to mid-off
Yuvraj joins the party now, he strikes off his second ball just as Sehwag had, Kulasekara goes for the drive and is caught by Tendulkar at extra cover, one more wicket to go
opens the face and plays it towards square leg
Fernando backs away, that pitches it wide outside off and turns further away, well out of Fernando's reach
Fernando's not going to hang around, he swings at it, connects and that gets him a boundary to the midwicket boundary
driven to wide mid-off
Mendis defends it towards mid-off
opens the face a bit and blocks it towards cover
blocked back to the bowler
massive turn for Ojha, Mendis leaves that one by playing inside the line
swept uppishly towards fine leg
huge appeal for caught behind, lovely loop for Ojha, pitching on middle and going across the batsman, Fernando didn't have too much of a clue about that one
Mendis is beaten as he tries to defend outside the offstump
flatter ball, fired into offstump, turned towards midwicket off the backfoot
tossed up this time, the batsman gets on the front foot and defends
looking to give the charge, beaten in the air, almost loses his balance as he scrambles back into the crease
tries to dab it to third man, get an edge which bounces at his feet before going to the keeper
big swing this time, gets an edge which flies over slip, doesn't go all the way to the boundary, batsmen help themselves to two
superb delivery, pitching on middle, beats the batsman outside off
he getting a lot of bounce here for Ojha, the batsman defends this one to point
watchfully tapped back to the bowler
slides on to the pads, tucked behind square for a single
nice flight again from Ojha, Fernando is beaten as he tries to guide it to third man
much flatter this time, pushed to point by Fernando
backs away and cuts the ball wide of the cover fielder, Tendulkar gives chase and fields
slapped firmly to Tendulkar
defended back to the bowler
flighted delivery, that gets the outside edge and squirts away to backward point
Mendis goes for a massive mow over midwicket,misses the ball completely
punched off the backfoot towards cover
flights his legbreak, Mendis backs away and cuts to sweeper cover
again tossed up, Fernando plants his foot down the ground and launches the ball over long-on for six
carved towards backward point, no run
steps out and swing over mid-off, timing was off but enough to take the ball over the boundary
spears it down the legside, Fernando can't get bat on it, thuds into his pads
backs away and chops it towards cover
wide again and a repeat of the previous shot, placement is better this time, Ojha has to chase
comes down the track and blocks it to the bowler

Mendis rocks back and slashes that towards cover again, straight to the fielder,  Fernando had set off for a single, he's sent back, he slips as he turns, and Tendulkar fires the return to Yuvraj who deflects the ball onto the stumps, that seals the series for India
